module.name: Caller ID Lookup
module.description: Allows Caller ID Lookup of incoming calls against different sources (MySQL, HTTP, ENUM, Phonebook Module)
module.changelog: *2.8.0.3* #4791, one more fix for cache reults *2.8.0.2* #4791 *2.8.0.1* #4679 *2.8.0.0* update to 2.8 *2.7.0.2* #3979 *2.7.0.1* might effect #3979 *2.7.0.0* localizations *2.6.0.1* #3599, #3821 *2.6.0.0* localizations, misc *2.5.0.5* #3345 *2.5.0.4* #3260, other localization work *2.5.0.3* localization fixes, Swedish *2.5.0.2* #3100, #3101 changes to work with new inbound route changes and fixes previous bug *2.5.0.1* #2987, #3001 sqlite3 install script and spelling fixes *2.5.0* #2845 tabindex *2.4.0.3* remove cidlookup field from core incoming table - should never have been there *2.4.0.2* #2843 Russian Translation *2.4.0.1* #2541 migrate from channel routing and re-enable functionality *2.4.0* it translations, bump for 2.4 *1.2.1.3* #2172 deprecated use of |, changed categories *1.2.1.2* bump for rc1 *1.2.1.1* shorten menu name *1.2.1* changed freePBX to FreePBX *1.2.0* Added SQLite3 support, fixes ticket:1796 (FreePBX 2.3 only) *1.1.1* Add he_IL translation *1.1* First release for FreePBX 2.2 - Fixed compatibility issue with new UI *1.0.4* Updated module.xml format *1.0.3* Fixes from #999 *1.0.1* Added possibility to cache in astDB Added lookup from cache before querying external source *1.0.0* First release
